title.rendered: “IDF Counterstrikes: Elimination of Hezbollah Terrorists and Destruction of Military Infrastructure in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF eliminated terrorists this morning in a vehicle attack in southern Lebanon who belonged to the Imam Hussein Division and had previously launched rocket attacks on Israeli territory; military infrastructure of the Hezbollah terrorist organization was targeted overnight and this morning.

Aircraft attacked a vehicle in southern Lebanon this morning carrying several terrorists who had fired rockets towards Israel. The terrorists were operating under the Imam Hussein Division, which is affiliated with Iran and acts on behalf of the Hezbollah terrorist organization.

In addition, a short time ago, fighter jets attacked a Hezbollah terrorist infrastructure in southern Lebanon, and during the night, two additional military buildings of the terrorist organization in Blida were attacked.

Attached is video documentation of the vehicle attack and elimination of the terrorists: https://bit.ly/3P6NUEO

Attached is video documentation of IDF assaults: https://bit.ly/3TjhrNO
